content.raw:
the windows jenkins build is now failing, as the examples can only find a 32-bit ignition-cmake cmake config file, but they are expecting 64 bits

* upstream cmake issue: https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/issues/16184

perhaps we can fix the fake install to use the same bitness as the parent project?
content.html:
the windows jenkins build is now failing, as the examples can only find a 32-bit ignition-cmake cmake config file, but they are expecting 64 bits

  • upstream cmake issue: https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/issues/16184

perhaps we can fix the fake install to use the same bitness as the parent project?
